title: Effective Online Lecture Video Design and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: A course on instructional design theoryâ€“applied video production methods in blended learning environments (combining in-person and online instruction).

learning_goals: Learners can design effective online lecture videos by applying the seven core principles based on instructional design theory.
Learners can propose at least three video composition strategies (e.g., segmentation, interactive element placement) to enhance learner engagement.
Learners can explain a video improvement process reflecting participant feedback in four or more stages.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
